main event: A bright light, round in shape and the size of a full moon, was observed in the Presque Isle area, Maine, descending and leaving a bright trail before disappearing over the horizon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 15 seconds,The object gave off red and white flashing lights,The event was reported by a civilian source,Military personnel also reported similar sightings in the area,Conclusion suggested the event may have been a natural phenomenon or an aircraft.
witness description: There were multiple reports from both military and civilian observers.
